timeline.author: gabrywu

timeline.bodyText: result = jsonObject.path("job").path("state").asText() always assign a value to result ,which empty string indicating a null value . In original logic ,null value will throw NPE in the following switch. Now the result is empty string ,then getApplicationStatus method will return ExecutionStatus.RUNNING_EXEUTION. I think you'd better optimize the switch logic. only a suggestion
timeline.author: gabrywu

timeline.message:
1. specified jackson Date format.
2. remove getMapper method,replace with toList()
3. rewrite toList method,support constructCollectionType.
4. parseObject(resp, Map.class) replace to toMap() method
5. rename JacksonSerialize to JsonSerializer

rewrite createArrayNode,createObjectNode method will Affect too many lines ，i will fix it in the next pr.

Merge pull request #1 from apache/dev

merge

1. specified jackson Date format.
2. remove getMapper method,replace with toList()
3. rewrite toList method,support constructCollectionType.
4. parseObject(resp, Map.class) replace to toMap() method
5. rename JacksonSerialize to JsonSerializer

rewrite createArrayNode,createObjectNode method will Affect too many lines ，i will fix it in the next pr.
